articles.description: Tiger Woods' long-standing world ranking record is beaten by Scottie Scheffler following victory at the WGC Match Play.
articles.content:
Scottie Scheffler ended a long-standing World No.1 record held by Tiger Woods following victory at the WGC Match Play on Sunday. 
Scheffler, who has now won three times in his last five PGA Tour sta… [+1422 chars]
